title: Trump Launches Strikes on Iran: Triumph or Trap?
summary: On June 22, President Donald Trump ordered precision airstrikes on Iranian military targets. The strikes mark a major escalation in the U.S.–Iran conflict and have prompted international concern about potential retaliation and disruption to oil flows.
timeline: June 21, 2025 — U.S. conducts airstrikes against Iranian military installations
June 22, 2025 — Iran threatens retaliation and raises military alert status
June 22, 2025 — Oil markets surge on fears of Strait of Hormuz disruption
why_matters: The Strait of Hormuz handles nearly 20% of global oil supply. Any Iranian attempt to close the strait could trigger global energy shocks, increased inflation, and further military escalation involving regional allies.
